Marchesa Bot FAQ

This page is an FAQ on how to use Marchesa Bot, possible problems and fixes; it will provide help for the Squire Bot integration.

Player Deck Verification Issues

Players Being Kicked Wrongly

If a player is kicked the name that was sent to the API may be wrong it can up updated via the ../api/updateplayerinfo endpoint. When a player is kicked it will tell you the names it was expecting, which can then be used to find the player name that was typed in wrongly.

With Squire Bot...

With Squire Bot you can use the command
!tricebot-update-player "Tournament Name" "Match Number" "player name" "new player name"
For example to change the name "Vldimir" to "Vladimir" in tournament "fnm-3/6", match 5, the command would be:
!tricebot-update-player fnm-3/6 5 Vldimir Vladimir

Alternatively You Can Disable Player Deck Verification...

Alternatively you can disable player deck verification with the ../api/disableplayerdeckverification endpoint.

With Squire Bot...

With Squire Bot you can use the command
!ticebot-disable-pdi "Tournament Name" "Match Number"
For example the command to disable player deck verification for match 5 of tournament "fnm-3/6" the command would be:
!tricebot-disable-pdi fnm-3/6 5

Games Not Showing in Cockatrice

Wrong Cockatrice Version

If you have a cockatrice with version of 2.8.0 or less then the client does not support games made by spectators. Current Cockatrice version. The version in which support for games with no players was introduced was 2.8.1 beta 2

Wrong Game Filter

You should have "Show password protected games" enabled, game type filters should all be un-ticked and, the spectator filters should also all be unticked. If these are your settings then it should show the games. You can use the "Creator Name" filter to find the game far faster, for Squire Bot the creator is called "Marchesa Bot".

Replay Cannot Be Downloaded

If the replay cannot be downloaded with a file not found message then either:
  • The game has ended and some players are still in the game or;
  • The replay link is broken.
If the game is still in progress then a webpage will appear showing which players are in the game.
